Hero.description: As a Full Stack Software Engineer, I am a developer of SaaS products with +4 years of experience.

About.title: About Me
About.description: Full-stack Software Engineer with 4+ years of proven experience building robust web and SaaS applications independently from scratch, collaborating closely with executive leadership and stakeholders. Passionate about clean, scalable solutions, consistently demonstrating determination, technical excellence, and teamwork. Driven by genuine enthusiasm for software engineering and continuous growth.
